name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 015
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. There’s Hope On The Horizon, utilizes BOTH Pantone colors of 2021, Illuminating and Ultimate Gray to create a hopeful color palette, because what is 2021 if not hopeful. The US has rid itself of a Trump presidency (no matter what he says), the vaccine rollout has been incredibly successful with more people getting vaccinated every day, and there have been steps in the right direction surrounding police reform and accountability. We still have a long way to go but I think Hope Is On The Horizon.
